title: Your account is in the process of transferring
body:
My friend have problem with log-in on his account i cant login to his account too. It was okey before yesterday. It is saying this message : Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in few minutes.                             
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Definitely don't try to log into his account if it doesn't belong to you, that can cause issues with recovery.  Instead, have your friend reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll help him with this.  We'll get back to him as soon as we can!
